name: SupportColmAndMarisa
_source: speak;Colm;Hey, you!|Have you seen a scary-looking woman?
speak;Colm;NO.|I don't have any sisters.|The woman I'm talking about was beautiful, but also very scary.|Have you seen someone who fits that description?
speak;Marisa;I don't think so.|Beautiful but very scary...|What do you mean by that?

speak;Colm;Well, I'm not exactly sure, either.|I just heard from one of Gerik's mercenaries that there is a woman sword fighter here.|Apparently, she's very talented and was hired for an unbelievable sum.
speak;Colm;Rumor is that if you speak to her without thinking, she's likely to attack you out of nowhere!
speak;Colm;Maybe her face is scarred from fighting.|Yeah, that's probably it!|She's beautiful, but has a very sad past behind that scar.|And that's why she's so scary!

speak;Colm;Or maybe it's because her lover was killed, and she's trying to avenge him.|That seems equally plausible, doesn't it?|Anyway, if you see her around, would you tell her that I was looking for her?|See ya.
speak;Marisa;Well, I'm the only female sword fighter here.|I guess he was looking for me.|He is so clueless...
speak;Colm;Oh, hi, Marisa!|I'm sorry for what I said the other day.|I figured out that you were the scary woman I was talking about.|I'm Colm. Nice to meet you.
speak;Marisa;OK.|So, what did you want from me?
speak;Colm;Oh, nothing special.|I just wanted to meet the famous swordswoman.|I was going to challenge you to a match, but I've seen you fight and know how good you are.|You'd beat me senseless.
speak;Marisa;I'll accept a match with you anytime.
speak;Colm;Well, I don't know how else to say this.|You're scaring me.
speak;Colm;Yeah.|It sounds funny, but you never look at the enemy...|I mean...you don't care about the enemy at all.
speak;Marisa;I have no idea what you're talking about.|Speak English.
speak;Colm;I mean...|Even when the enemy is right in front of you, you aren't even looking at him.|You're fighting something else.
speak;Colm;I'm not that smart, and I don't know much about swords.|So I can't say exactly who or what it is you are really fighting.
speak;Colm;Um...|What I mean to say is good luck in all your battles.|Um...|That's it.|See you later!
speak;Marisa;I was thinking about what you were saying the other day.
speak;Colm;You mean about you not fighting the enemy in front of you, but something else?|Is that what you're talking about?
speak;Marisa;Do you want to know?|What I'm really fighting with?
speak;Colm;Huh?|Y-yeah......|If you want to tell me, sure.
speak;Marisa;What I'm really fighting with is...
speak;Marisa;Well, to be more precise, his shadow.
speak;Marisa;He was one of the most famous swordsmen in Jehanna.|He was also a mercenary.
speak;Colm;I see why you're so good.
speak;Marisa;Ever since I was a child, my father taught me how to live as a mercenary.
speak;Marisa;The harsh conditions of Jehanna breed strength and ruthlessness.|The only way to survive is by being a mercenary.
speak;Marisa;My father is my parent, my teacher, and above all, a mountain I must conquer.
speak;Marisa;Once I conquer the mountain, I can accomplish anything I want.
speak;Colm;That must be a...big mountain.|So, where are you on the mountain?|A third of the way up?|Halfway up?|Or can you already see the summit?
speak;Colm;You still have a long way to go, huh?
speak;Marisa;...Yes.|I don't even know where the summit is yet.
speak;Colm;Well, then, you don't know how long it will take, do you?
speak;Marisa;I'll just keep climbing.|Even if it takes me forever...
speak;Colm;Oh.|I see.|Well, good luck.|I'm sure you'll make it to the top.
speak;Colm;Ha ha ha!|Oh, please.|You're embarrassing me.
